name: Accounting Application
title: SME Accounting Control Center
short_description: Get cashflow clarity, faster invoicing, and fewer month-end surprises in one workflow.
outcome_statement: Reduce invoice-to-payment cycle time by up to 30% and cut manual bookkeeping effort by 8-12 hours per week.
target_icp: SME companies with 20-200 employees, led by finance managers, operations managers, or founders overseeing cashflow.
primary_pain_points: Late invoice payments reduce predictable cashflow
Manual reconciliation consumes finance team time
Month-end reporting is slow and error-prone
Finance data is scattered across tools
workflows_included: Invoice creation and approval: standardize invoice output and reduce billing delays
Payment tracking and reminders: follow up automatically to improve collection rates
Reconciliation workflow: match transactions faster with fewer manual checks
Executive finance dashboard: track profitability and cash position in real time
install_steps: Install package from Robo Meister Store
Connect your billing and payment accounts
Import customers, chart of accounts, and open invoices
Activate invoice reminders and reconciliation rules
Review dashboard KPIs and assign finance owners
expansion_triggers: Need consolidated reporting across multiple entities
pricing_hint: Best for teams on Growth and Scale plans that need finance process automation.
